page.title: 12Local Services:-Old People
page.content: Barncoose Hospital is situated between Redruth and Camborne. It has been helping the older people of the area for over 100 years. It takes people from a ten-mile radius. The hospital has had an extension built and the old section has been modernised.There is a kitchen for the patients which is a bit cramped but a good idea.There are different wards for the patients, one for male and the other for female.Outside the door are steps for people who can walk and a ramp for wheelchairs.Each ward has a day room which has a television and a video,a radio and some books.The hospital is only used for elderly patients and I would recommend it to my own Grandparents. It is a very good and clean hospital.
